# CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundTowardPositiveInfinity

**Case**

Rounds toward positive infinity.

## Declaration

```swift
case roundTowardPositiveInfinity
```

## Discussion

This method rounds toward [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/positiveInfinity] if the fraction isn’t equal to `0`.

## Rounding Methods

- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundHalfAwayFromZero**: Rounds half away from zero.
- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundAwayFromZero**: Rounds away from zero.
- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundTowardZero**: Rounds toward zero.
- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.quickTime**: Rounds using the QuickTime method.
- **CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundTowardNegativeInfinity**: Rounds toward negative infinity.
title: CMTimeRoundingMethod.roundTowardPositiveInfinity
